title: fedreg_and_gpo
abstract:
July 14, 2009
Michael L. Wash, Chief Information Officer
Government Printing Office
732 North Capitol Street, NW
Washington, DC 20401
Dear Mr. Wash:
I am writing in the matter of the $17,000 bulk data product that we purchased from 
your agency, the Code of Federal Regulations Source Code with Images.  I understand 
you may not be the proper official at the GPO to whom I should be speaking and would 
appreciate it if that is the case if you would redirect me elsewhere.
As you know, on September
